channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

I took some time to go over how I try to simplify my options trading in the morning and how I hunt down the best penny [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Don‚Äôt buy the dip as the summer slump is officially here, says Goldman strategist
item.description: Wading in for bargains right now is not the way to go, says Goldman Sachs‚Äô tactical strategist Scott Rubner, who offers seasonal caution.

item.title: Can Boeing get back to its glory days?
item.description: Boeing's leaders say they have charted a path forward to fix the company. They still have plenty of people to convince.

item.title: 'Britain will be a friend and a partner': UK's Starmer aims to overhaul EU relations at key summit
item.description: The U.K.'s new Labour Prime Minister Keir Starmer is seeking to reset fractured relations with Europe as he hosts more than 45 heads of state at a summit.

item.title: Takeovers, mergers and asset purchases
item.description: Good day, 360! Here are our top investing ideas today. And don‚Äôt forget to join us in Market Masters ‚Äì the hottest trading room around üî•. Be the best prepared trader on the Street! FOCUS LISTüîé ADTX ‚Äì Up over 80% in pre after amended merger agreement with Evofem, targeting September 30 closing GDTC ‚Äì [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Tech selloff erases $1.1 trillion of ‚ÄòMagnificent Seven‚Äô market cap in five days
item.description: The seven Big Tech companies collectively shed more than $500 billion in market cap on Wednesday alone.

item.title: Biden says he might quit presidential race if 'medical condition' emerged
item.description: Biden, 81, has come under increasing pressure from members of his own party to withdraw from the race following his disastrous debate with Trump, 78.

item.title: China's Communist Party removes ex-foreign, defence ministers from top body
item.description: The ruling Communist Party ended its long-delayed third plenum on Thursday, a meeting of the 205-member Central Committee held roughly once every five years to map out the general direction of the country's long-term social and economic policies.

item.title: Gamma Trigger Strikes Again! ‚ö°
item.description: Reminder: JW‚Äôs Options Class 7ET Did you catch the new long-term lithium play I showed you this morning? That stock ended up 21% higher today. That could be the start, so make sure you keep it on your list. At this price, I think it is a ‚Äúno-brainer‚Äù to at least look into right now. [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Infosys meets earnings estimate as sales edge past consensus
item.description: Indian outsourcing giant Infosys reported growing profits as it forecast a slight pickup in sales growth for the year.

item.title: United Airlines profit jumps 23%, but third-quarter forecast disappoints amid industry overcapacity
item.description: United and Delta have benefited from an increase in consumers' shift to premium cabins.

item.title: Nokia shares slide 8% after posting lowest quarterly net sales figure since 2015
item.description: Shares of Finnish telecom firm Nokia plunged after a steep drop in sales and operating profit in the second quarter.

item.title: Trump survives g, stock up 50%
item.description: Good morning, 360! Don‚Äôt forget to join us today for LIVE trading in the Market Master‚Äôs Room ‚Äî and for OPTIONS BOOTCAMP with JW starting TONIGHT at 7pm EST. item.title: Slowdown in U.K. jobs market could pave way for BoE interest rate cut, Deutsche Bank says
item.description: The Office for National Statistics data shows a slowdown in the U.K.‚Äôs labor market that could see the Bank of England cut interest rates at its upcoming meeting on August 1

item.title: House Democrats circulate letter urging DNC not to rush Biden nomination
item.description: President Biden has faced mounting pressure to drop out of the race after his debate flop against Donald Trump in June.

item.title: TSMC second-quarter profit beats expectations as AI chip boom continues
item.description: TSMC on Thursday beat revenue and profit expectations in the second quarter, as demand for advanced chips used in AI applications continue to surge.

item.title: ‚ÄòI‚Äôm not jealous ‚Äî just genuinely curious‚Äô: How can a woman work from home and mind her 3-year-old child at the same time?
item.description: ‚ÄúWhat do you all think about employees who work from home and have little kids to watch at the same time?‚Äù

item.title: Rep. Adam Schiff calls on Biden to drop out of election contest, warns of losing Congress
item.description: Rep. Adam Schiff is one of the most prominent Democrats to urge President Joe Biden to let another nominee face Donald Trump in the presidential election.

item.title: Volvo Cars jumps 7% after reporting a record core operating profit
item.description: Shares of Volvo Cars rose sharply on Thursday after the company reported a jump in annual operating profit for the second quarter.
